mapper.select: SELECT PAYROLL_NO, PAYROLL_DATE, PAYROLL_ORDER, BASE_SALARY, MEAL_ALLOWANCE, CHILD_ALLOWANCE, JOB_ALLOWANCE, CAR_CARE_ALLOWANCE, TENURE_ALLOWANCE, DUTY_ALLOWANCE, BONUS_ALLOWANCE, HOLIDAY_ALLOWANCE FROM PAYROLL WHERE (M_NUMBER = #{m_number} OR #{m_number} = 'ALL') AND PAYROLL_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{pay_day}, 'yyyy-MM') AND PAYROLL_DATE < ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{pay_day}, 'yyyy-MM'), 1) AND PAYROLL_ORDER = #{pay_order}
SELECT NATIONAL_PENSION, HEALTH_INSURANCE, LONG_TERM_CARE_INSURANCE, EMPLOYMENT_INSURANCE, INCOME_TAX, RESIDENT_TAX, ETC_DEDUCTION FROM DEDUCTION WHERE PAYROLL_NO = #{payNo}
SELECT M_TYPE, M_NUMBER, M_NAME, M_CLASS, M_POSITION, M_CONDITION FROM MEMBER_LIST WHERE (M_CLASS = #{m_class} OR #{m_class} = 'ALL') AND (M_CONDITION = #{m_condition} OR #{m_condition} = 'ALL');
mapper.insert:
select payroll_seq.nextval from dual
INSERT INTO PAYROLL ( M_NUMBER, PAYROLL_DATE, PAYROLL_ORDER, BASE_SALARY, MEAL_ALLOWANCE, CHILD_ALLOWANCE, JOB_ALLOWANCE, CAR_CARE_ALLOWANCE, TENURE_ALLOWANCE, DUTY_ALLOWANCE, BONUS__ALLOWANCE, HOLIDAY_ALLOWANCE) VALUES ( #{m_number}, #{payDay}, #{payOrder}, #{basePay}, #{mealPay}, #{childPay}, #{jobPay}, #{carPay}, #{tenurePay}, #{dutyPay}, #{bonusPay}, #{holidayPay})

INSERT INTO DEDUCTION ( PAYROLL_NO, NATIONAL_PENSION, HEALTH_INSURANCE, LONG_TERM_CARE_INSURANCE, EMPLOYMENT_INSURANCE, INCOME_TAX, RESIDENT_TAX, ETC_DEDUCTION) VALUES ( #{payNo}, #{nationalPension}, #{healthInsurance}, #{longInsurance}, #{emplInsurance}, #{incomeTax}, #{residentTax}, #{etcDeduction, jdbcType=VARCHAR2})
mapper.update: UPDATE PAYROLL SET PAYROLL_DATE = #{payDay}, PAYROLL_ORDER = #{payOrder}, BASE_SALARY = #{basePay}, MEAL_ALLOWANCE = #{mealPay}, CHILD_ALLOWANCE = #{childPay}, JOB_ALLOWANCE = #{jobPay}, CAR_CARE_ALLOWANCE = #{carPay}, TENURE_ALLOWANCE = #{tenurePay}, DUTY_ALLOWANCE = #{dutyPay}, BONUS__ALLOWANCE = #{bonusPay}, HOLIDAY_ALLOWANCE = #{holidayPay} WHERE PAYROLL_NO = #{payNo}

UPDATE DEDUCTION SET NATIONAL_PENSION = #{nationalPension}, HEALTH_INSURANCE = #{healthInsurance}, LONG_TERM_CARE_INSURANCE = #{longInsurance}, EMPLOYMENT_INSURANCE = #{emplInsurance}, INCOME_TAX = #{incomeTax}, RESIDENT_TAX = #{residentTax}, ETC_DEDUCTION = #{etcDeduction, jdbcType=VARCHAR2} WHERE PAYROLL_NO = #{payNo}
